page.title: 06Farming and Industry
page.content: In Penshurst the{pubs}are:Spotted Dog, Bottle House, Leicester Arms. The{industry}in Penshurst is:Mace, Post Office and newsagent, Quaintways and Fir Trees tea rooms, Shoe mender, Bank, Baker, Nina Arnotts, Coal Merchants and Vineyards. The{farms}in Penshurst:Swaylands Farm, Nashes Farm, Elliott's Farm, Home Farm Penshurst, Bowens Farm. In Speldhurst the{pubs}are :George and Dragon, and the Northfield public house. The{industry}in Speldhurst is: Post Office , Bakery, Building Society, Sewage Works, Peters Bank. The{farms}in Speldhurst are: Clock House Farm, Home Farm Speldhurst, Bardenmill Farm, Bardenmill Furnace Farm, Hamsell Farm.
